title: LtiLibrary.AspNet
description: ASP.NET library with IMS LTI support for Tool Consumer and Tool Provider applications. Supports IMS LTI 1.0, 1.1, 1.1.1 and 1.2; Outcomes 1.0; Outcomes 2.0 (Draft); and Content-Item Message 1.0.
